GSD.description:
blk-throttle: prevent overflow while calculating wait time

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 70b2adb1d698fbc63d3b3848c452524dc15872c5. For more details please see the references link.
